validate.connectionTimedOut: Connection timed out. Please try again later.
validate.emptyDescriptionStatusFailureMessage: Status Description field cannot be empty.
validate.emptyPhoneFailureMessage: Phone number field cannot be empty.
validate.emptyTcFailureMessage: TC Identity Number field cannot be empty.
validate.invalidEmailFailureMessage: Please enter a valid email address
validate.invalidPasswordFailureMessage: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, and 1 special character.
validate.invalidTcFailureMessage: You entered your T.C. Identity number incorrectly.
validate.locationDeniedForever: Location permission denied. Please enable location permission in settings.
validate.locationPermissionDeniedMessage: Location permission denied. Please grant location permission.
validate.locationServiceDisabledMessage: Location service is disabled. Please enable location service.
validate.longPasswordFailureMessage: Password should be at most 12 characters.
validate.passwordLowerCaseFailureMessage: Password should contain at least one lowercase letter.
validate.passwordSpecialCharacterFailureMessage: Password should contain at least one special character.
validate.passwordTurkishCharacterFailureMessage: Password should not contain Turkish characters.
validate.passwordUpperCaseFailureMessage: Password should contain at least one uppercase letter.
validate.shortPasswordFailureMessage: Password should be at least 8 characters.
validate.shortTcFailureMessage: TC Identity Number should be 11 digits.
validate.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
